a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Cropland extent over the long-term, 1600 to 2016
Total cropland area, measured in hectares. Cropland refers to the area defined by the UN Food and
Agricultural Organization (FAO) as 'arable land and permanent crops'.
Data source: History Database of the Global Environment (2017)
